text: Saying: Throw him into the ark) put the baby in the ark, (and throw it into the river) and place the ark in the river, (then the river shall throw it on to the bank) of the river, (and there an enemy to Me) as concern Religion, i.e. Pharaoh (and an enemy to him) who intends to kill (shall take him) shall pick him up. (And I endued thee with love from Me) O Moses, such that whoever sees you loves you (that thou mightest be trained according to My will) whatever was done to you was under our very watch,
